documentation.description: This metric evaluates the transparency and completeness of the dataset creation documentation, which is crucial for reproducibility, ethical assessment, and downstream usability.

has_documentation.description: Set to true if the dataset creation process is documented in the paper.

reference.description: The location in the paper where the process is described (e.g., 'Section 4.1').

reasoning.description: Justification based on the paper content explaining why the dataset creation process is said to be documented or not in the paper.
